Posts.Content: My name is Betty, I had a simple mastectomy Qct.12, 2007 I still have to return to the surgon weekly to have 60 + cc removed. We have put the drains back in four times and after removal it comes back. This has gone on for four months now. Does any one have any suggestions. I'm really tired of this.
Posts.Title: Excessive drainage after simple mastectomy
